Class OrderDetails

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.littemplate.LitTemplate
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.ui.views.orderedit.OrderDetails
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.internal.Template, Serializable
@Tag("order-details") @JsModule("./src/views/orderedit/order-details.js") public class OrderDetails extends com.vaadin.flow.component.littemplate.LitTemplate
The component displaying a full (read-only) summary of an order, and a comment field to add comments.
